short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any web page to a PDF document that resembles as closely as possible what you see in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly convert any webpage to a PDF document. This extension reads the content of the current web page and sends it to GrabzIt's API for conversion before automatically downloading it to your computer. The PDF conversion tries to make the PDF closely resemble the actual web page using the correct styling. You can even secure your PDF by setting a password for the document.

Once you have installed your extension just follow the instructions in the extension popup to sign up and get converting! 

While using GrabzIt is and always will be free forever. After your automatic premium free trial expires you can optionally upgrade to hide cookie notices, increase your monthly allowance, and set headers and footers.
